description: Under the swaying canopy of a giant bamboo forest, Andrew Phillips and Joe Foster submit to desire.  As stiff cocks stretch sarongs and libido swells, Joe and Andrew stroke, fondle, and suck their way out of their trappings and into a sultry session of rimming followed by a smooth and rhythmic ass-pounding.  The bamboo groans and tropical birdsongs saturate the setting while Andrew and Joe surrender to their lust.
title: Drenched, Part 1:  Soaking It In
